message.entry: For ScaleFactor of {0} and image size of {1}x{2}, NumLevels must be a maximum value of {3}. NumLevels is modified from the value of {4} to {3}.

Points tracking is lost. The number of tracked points in the current frame is below the lowerLimit of TrackFeatureRange. This can happen when the frame does not contain enough features or due fast camera movement resulting in excessive blurring or a full, abrupt change of the scene. It may be possible to improve the results by increasing the upperLimit value of the TrackFeatureRange and/or decreasing the SkipMaxFrames value to add key frames more frequently.
\nEnabling verbose mode. This might affect performance.\n
Expected stereovslam input number 1 to be a scalar cameraIntrinsics object or a 4-by-4 reprojection matrix.
The difference between maximum and minimum values of DisparityRange must be divisible by 16.
The values of DisparityRange must be smaller in magnitude than the image width, {0} pixels.
To pass IMU measurments in addFrame, the monovslam object should be created with valid IMU parameters, represented as a factorIMUParameters object.
Gyroscope and accelerometer measurements must have the same size.
Code generation is not supported for monovslam with IMU.
